mapper.update: update weiit_weixin_mini_audit_log set status=#{status}, reason=#{reason}, update_time=now() WHERE authorizer_app_id=#{appid} AND is_current_version=0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM weiit_weixin_public_info WHERE authorizer_app_id=#{appid} LIMIT 1

SELECT ww.reply_id, ww.reply_type, ww.rule_name, ww.match_type, ww.key_name, ww.reply_content, ww.type_id, ww.authorizer_id FROM weiit_weixin_public_reply ww, weiit_weixin_public_info wi WHERE authorizer_app_id = #{appid} AND type_id = #{type_id} AND ww.authorizer_id = wi.authorizer_id
and key_name like concat('%', #{key_name}, '%')
order by reply_id desc limit 1
SELECT id, title, author, cover_img, main_body, media_id, create_time FROM weiit_weixin_public_media_article WHERE media_id=#{media_id} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT wp.*,wi.mini_path,wi.public_path FROM weiit_page_navs wp LEFT JOIN weiit_init_icon wi ON wp.nav_icon_id = wi.id WHERE shop_id =#{shop_id}
mapper.update: update weiit_weixin_mini_audit_log set is_current_version=-1, update_time=now() where shop_id = #{shop_id} AND authorizer_app_id=#{authorizer_app_id} AND is_current_version=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weiit_weixin_mini_audit_log ( audit_id, authorizer_app_id, origin_id, status, create_time, update_time, version_no, template_id, shop_id ) VALUES ( #{audit_id}, #{authorizer_app_id}, #{origin_id}, 2, now(), now(), #{version_no}, #{template_id}, #{shop_id} )
